briefTitle: The Rechallenge of ADCs in MBC Patients
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Real-world Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Antibody-drug Conjugates (ADCs) Rechallenge in Patients with Prior Exposure to ADCs Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age \> 18 years old.
* Diagnosed with Metastatic Breast Cancer.
* Patients with prior exposure to ADC (either in the adjuvant setting or metastatic disease are allowed).
* Patients plan to or have received ADCs for the second or more time.
* Complete medical history was available.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Medical history was incomplete
